recipes.description: A classic Roman pasta dish made with eggs, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper. The sauce is created by combining raw eggs with cheese that are cooked by the heat of the freshly cooked pasta.
A fragrant and creamy curry made with coconut milk and green curry paste, featuring tender chicken and fresh vegetables.
A quick and nutritious breakfast featuring mashed avocado on toasted sourdough bread with simple seasonings.
A luxurious dish of beef tenderloin wrapped in mushroom duxelles, prosciutto, and puff pastry, then baked to perfection.
A traditional Japanese soup made with fermented soybean paste, dashi stock, and various additions like tofu and seaweed.
